message: I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. This is a fair offer considering the inflation rate. Let's not waste time with further rounds.
I propose a 55/45 split in my favor. While I value fairness, I believe this split better reflects the current inflation rates and offers a more equitable outcome for both of us.

Bob, let's be reasonable. I understand your position, but my previous offer was already generous. This is 52/48 in my favor -  it minimizes our losses from inflation.  Accepting this now is the smartest move for both of us.
